并非所有中国食品都是平等的：研究通过炎症潜力排名美食研究人员使用饮食炎症指数（DII）分析了八种主要中国美食的980盘，以评估其营养概况和炎症潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/not-all-chinese-food-is-equal-is-qual----------- ranks-cuisines-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-potential.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/not-all-chinese-food-is-equal-es-equal-squal-cuisines-cuisines-cuisines-by-shiman-by-shimand-potential.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2304C1E3-0A2B-4562-4562-8ACC-7A1EC9C9C9C9C9C9FE57 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 00:12:00 -0400 Not all Chinese food is equal: study ranks cuisines by inflammatory potential
食品输送应用程序可以降低盐的使用，而一小部分则可以研究人员测试了中国食品送货应用程序上的菜单设计和健康消息是否可以推动客户订购低盐餐。他们发现，更改菜单上的默认设置（尤其是默认为“减少盐”）比单独的教育信息更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/food-delivery-apps-can-lower-salt-salt-use-with-with-one-small-change.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/food-delivery-apps-can-lower-salt-salt-salt-us-with-one-no------------ use-with-one-small-change.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=832027CD-509E-4EDA-AEDA-A523-F1E0D99CF446 Sun, 30 Mar 2025 23:32:00 -0400 Food delivery apps can lower salt use with one small change
AI揭示了全球包装食品中有多少隐藏糖研究人员开发了一种机器学习算法，以准确预测全球包装食品中的免费糖含量。该模型可以根据纤维和糖含量对碳水化合物质量进行大规模评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/ai-reveals-how-much-much-hidden-hidden-sugar-is-in-in-cake--in-cake--foods-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/ai-reveals-how-much-hidden-hidden-hidden-sugar-is-in-in-ac-in-cappaged-foods-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3065020-7d96-466f-a7fc-fc-fc9638003672 Sun, 30 Mar 2025 23:08:00 -0400 AI reveals how much hidden sugar is in packaged foods worldwide

享乐主义饮食肥胖的淡出 - 但神经素有助于将其带​​回慢性高脂饮食通过损害小鼠的NACLAT→VTA信号传导，大脑对丰富食物的愉悦反应。神经素的功能障碍是这种作用的基础，但是恢复其信号会恢复享乐喂养并减少肥胖症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/hedonic-eating-fades-with-with-obesitye28094but-neurotensin-helpsin-helps-bring-it-bring-it-back.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/hedonic-eating-fades-with-with-obesitye28094but-neurotensin-helpsin-helps-bring-it-bring-it-back.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=860C6B53-27B0-4178-A589-44CE1EDEF0B4 Sun, 30 Mar 2025 20:34:00 -0400 Hedonic eating fades with obesity—but neurotensin helps bring it back
每天吃超级过程的食物会增加老年人的抑郁症风险每天吃四份或更多份超处理的食物会使老年人的抑郁症风险增加10％，并适度降低其与心理健康相关的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/eating-ultra-processed-food-daily-daily-increases-daily-increases-depression-depression-risk-in--inderer-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/eating-ultra-processed-food-daily-daily-increases-daily-increases-depression-risk-in--in grod-inderds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=C700315-3C91-43A2-8568-54EA1F8AEE61 Sun, 30 Mar 2025 20:05:00 -0400 Eating ultra-processed food daily increases depression risk in older adults

Bentracimab在手术和出血事件期间逆转Ticagrelor的抗血小板效应根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院（ACC25）的一项研究，一种作为对抗血小板剂Ticagrelor的解毒剂而开发的药物，可以安全有效地逆转Ticagrelor的抗血小板效应或经历重度出血的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/bentracimab-reverses-ticagrelors-antiplatelet-effects-diring-during-serighergery-surgery-ander-surgery-and-bleeding-events.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/bentracimab-vreveres-ticagrelors-antiplatelet-effects-effects-dring-serighergery-surgery-andergery-ander-bleeding-events.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c476bb34-d908-4156-894f-6d2668f5c7e8 Sat, 29 Mar 2025 14:26:00 -0400 Bentracimab reverses ticagrelor's antiplatelet effects during surgery and bleeding events
